application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

div.formula: Q Ωi (R, t)✳ ❍❡r❡✱ ✇❡ ✜♥❞ ❛ ▲✐♣s❝❤✐t③ ❝♦♥✲ st❛♥t ❢♦r ❡❛❝❤ Q Ωi ✳ ❋✐rst✱ t❤❡ t❛r❣❡t ❢✉♥❝t✐♦♥ ✭✼✮ ✐s r❡❢♦r♠✉•❛t❡❞ ❛s Q Ωi (R, t) = Ωi F(z) T Γ(2πt T z) G(Rz) dz, ✭✶✻✮ ✇❤❡r❡ F(z), G(z) ∈ R 2 ❛r❡ t✇♦✲✈❡❝t♦rs ❝♦♥t❛✐♥✐♥❣ t❤❡ r❡❛• ❛♥❞ ✐♠❛❣✐♥❛r② ♣❛rts ♦❢ F (z) ❛♥❞ G(z) r❡s♣❡❝t✐✈❡•②✱ ❛♥❞ Γ(β) ✐s t❤❡ 2×2 r♦t❛t✐♦♥ ♠❛tr✐① ♦❢ ❛♥❣•❡ β✳ ◆♦✲ t✐❝❡ t❤❛t ✭✶✻✮ ✐s ✈❛•✐❞ ♦♥•② ✇❤❡♥ F ❛♥❞ G ❛r❡ ❋♦✉r✐❡r tr❛♥s❢♦r♠s ♦❢ r❡❛• s✐❣♥❛•s✳ ❯s✐♥❣ t❤✐s r❡♣r❡s❡♥t❛t✐♦♥✱ t❤❡ ♠❛❣♥✐t✉❞❡ ♦❢ t❤❡ ❞❡r✐✈❛t✐✈❡s ♦❢ t❤❡ t❛r❣❡t ❢✉♥❝t✐♦♥ ✐s ❜♦✉♥❞❡❞ ❛s ❢♦••♦✇s✿ d dt Q Ωi (R, t) ≤ 2π Ωi z F(z) T Γ ′ (2πt T z) G(Rz) dz ≤ 2π r i+1 Ωi |F(z) T Γ ′ (2πt T z) G(Rz)| dz ≤ 2π r i+1 Ωi F(z) G(Rz) dz ≤ 2π r i+1 Ωi F(z) 2 dz Ωi G(z) 2 dz def = L Ωi t . ✭✶✼✮ ◆♦t✐❝❡ t❤❛t Γ ′ (β) = d dβ Γ(β) ✐s ❛❣❛✐♥ ❛ r♦t❛t✐♦♥ ♠❛tr✐① ❛♥❞ r i+1 = sup z∈Ωi z ✳ ❋♦r t❤❡ ✷❉ ❝❛s❡✱ t❤❡ ♦♥•② r♦t❛t✐♦♥ ♣❛r❛♠❡t❡r ✐s ❛♥ ❛♥❣•❡ ♦❢ r♦t❛t✐♦♥ θ✳ ❚❤❡♥ | d dθ Q Ωi (R, t)| ≤ Ωi F(z) T Γ(2πt T z) J G (Rz) dR dθ z dz ≤ Ωi F(z) 2 dz Ωi J G (z) dR dθ R −1 z 2 dz, = Ωi F(z) 2 dz Ωi J G (z)z ⊥ 2 dz def = L Ωi θ , ✭✶✽✮ ✇❤❡r❡ J G ✐s t❤❡ ❏❛❝♦❜✐❛♥ ♠❛tr✐① ♦❢ G ❛♥❞ ❛♥❞ z ⊥✐s
